name: Dwytt's Guide to Wyrms [Part 1]
description:
Junk you should know

- Arrow keys to move or swipe if you’re on mobile. Collide with things to interact.

- Interact with things multiple times! There may be something you’re missing.

- I did not make the music. If you don’t know, it’s the default bitsy music. Adam and Jared Le Doux did it.

- If you find a typo, a bug, or just want to provide some constructive criticism, feel free to comment!
